mapper.select: select concat((@i :=@i + 1),'') AS ORDER_NUM, tx.* FROM (SELECT @i := 0) AS it, (SELECT td.DEALER_CODE,td.DEALER_NAME, (CASE WHEN td.IS_K4 =10041001 THEN '是' ELSE '否' END) IS_K4, (CASE WHEN td.IS_FIAT =10041001 THEN '是' ELSE '否' END) IS_FIAT, (CASE WHEN td.IS_CJD =10041001 THEN '是' ELSE '否' END ) IS_CJD, (CASE WHEN toed.PRODUCT_JEEP =10041001 THEN '是' ELSE '否' END) PRODUCT_JEEP, (CASE WHEN toed.PRODUCT_FAIT =10041001 THEN '是' ELSE '否' END) PRODUCT_FAIT, (CASE WHEN toed.PRODUCT_CJD =10041001 THEN '是' ELSE '否' END) PRODUCT_CJD,toed.PRODUCT_ID,topd.BRAND_NAME from TM_DEALER td LEFT JOIN TI_OPI_EXTENDED_DCS toed ON td.IS_K4 = toed.PRODUCT_JEEP OR td.IS_FIAT = toed.PRODUCT_FAIT OR td.IS_CJD = toed.PRODUCT_CJD LEFT JOIN TI_OPI_EXTENDED_MODEL topd ON toed.PRODUCT_ID = topd.PRODUCT_ID WHERE toed.PRODUCT_ID=#{PRODUCT_ID} AND td.IS_DEL = 0 GROUP BY td.DEALER_CODE,td.DEALER_NAME,toed.PRODUCT_ID,topd.BRAND_NAME) tx where tx.IS_K4 = '是' OR tx.IS_FIAT = '是' OR tx.IS_CJD='是'
